name: DEADWAR: OLD LIES
description:
"Story about..."DEADWAR is a story about cruelty of war. Game is focused on internal experience of main character. In DEADWAR you play as Steve. Steve is a commander of a special unit. Military service is a tradition in his family, his father was pilot, who died during service. Steve decided to continue "family tradition". Story of game takes place when a new president coming to power. Guerrilla war begins, but with whom...?


You know wars as historical events on a timeline, but have you ever thought about what it really is?About gameDEADWAR: OLD LIES is a singleplayer first-person shooter with two alternative ending. Game uses one of the newer versions CryEngine V with DirectX 12 support and optional VR support.Keys feature
  • Singleplayer first-person shooter game with two alternative ending
  • DX12 support
  • Game working on CryEngine V
  • Free to play without micropayments
